Package muscle.core.kernel

Interface Summary
KernelListener receive events about kernel status
 

Class Summary
CAController JADE agent to wrap a kernel (e.g.
KernelBootInfo this class should hold all info required to boot a kernel
NullKernelListener receive events about kernel status
RawKernel JADE agent to wrap a kernel (e.g.
RawKernel.Args  
TestController used for internal testing
to run this agent, give at least one set of three args: where == entrance|exit a portal name included in current connection scheme of the plumber DataTemplate and DataWrapper(s) will be generated from text files in example for plain JADE: a:muscle.core.kernel.TestController(exit AssertionExitA ~/path1 entrance FileReaderEntranceA ~/path2) example for JADE LEAP: a:muscle.core.kernel.TestController(exit,AssertionExitA,~/path1,entrance,FileReaderEntranceA,~/path2)
VoidKernel kernel which does nothing, usefulf for testing purposes e.g.
